about_the_game:
Cute & cool cat politicians battle in this deck-building game!
Play unlimited against players worldwide in this online two-player game!
Win by collecting more votes than your opponent using a variety of cards!

Start with the same deck and enhance it!
Collect money with Tax, utilize your turn better with Act, remove unnecessary cards with Reorg, obstruct your opponent with Imp, and permanently strengthen yourself with Enh. The strategy is limitless!
Experience the excitement of expanding reproduction!
A definitive multiplayer board game where you can enjoy different plays every time!

Rate and ranking, friend matches, cross-platform play, and cute emotes are all included!

Users who engage in the following actions may be restricted in part or in all functionalities: Causing trouble or discomfort to others, defamation, acts against public order and morals, deliberately tampering with the game, exchanging personal information.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4600
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Dollar King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
